artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Handwoven & handprinted with tiny wavy lines printed over alternating 6.5" & 12.75" vert. stripes. Vert. rpt. 36"; horiz. 19.5". Tiny green horizontal wavy lines handprinted over alternating 6-1/2" & 12-3/4" vertical stripes of salmon & mauve. Hor. Rpt. 19-1/2". Malachite
